item.title: Copying text to terminal based VMs in VirtualBox
item.description: You are configuring a terminal only virtual machine using VirtualBox. At some point, you need to download a file using wget. The URL is 150 characters long, with the usual mix of underscores, dashes, slashes, upper and lower case letters, numbers… Or, even worse, you need to enter your extremely long and complex password without seeing what you type. And remember, you CANNOT use the clipboard, because there’s no such thing in bare terminal VMs.

item.title: About
item.description: tl;dr Software developer. Infrastructure engineer. I like python, infrastructure as code, automation, linux sysadmin and weird old technology. Currently living in Veldhoven, Netherlands. Working At Working as a Consultant Engineer for Itility, currently allocated at ASML, helping to build the future. Past Employers ThoughtWorks Hogarth Worldwide Sindus ANDRITZ Lakes Environmental Dell SAP Valid Skills (a.k.a. buzzwords) Python Linux Sysadmin Shell scripting Ansible Terraform Some CICDs (GoCD, CircleCI, Buildkite, Bamboo, mostly the same, with different UIs) AWS GCP Cloudformation C# Java Javascript Find more in my LinkedIn profile.
